name: interstellar-calendar-project
description: As a project for NASA HUNCH 2024-2025, we are creating a website that will house an interstellar calendar that will keep track of the time on multiple planets at once. ## Links [NASA HUNCH Project List](https://www.nasahunch-software-ai.com/blank)

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run build && live-server src --port=8080" "npm run watch"
